meanings.sent1: She retrims her hair to make it shorter.
meanings.sent2: He retrims the bushes to give them a neat shape.
meanings.sent3: The barber retrims the customer's hair, but oops, it ends up too short!
meanings.sent4: The tailor retrims the dress, transforming it into a stunning gown.
meanings.sent5: The gardener retrims the hedge meticulously, creating a beautiful design.

meanings.definition: To make a new trim for.
meanings.sent1: She retrims the curtains with a lovely lace border.
meanings.sent2: He retrims the tablecloth to match the new decor.
meanings.sent3: The designer retrims the jacket with sparkly sequins for a glamorous look.
meanings.sent4: The artist retrims the painting with a bold red frame, enhancing its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The stylist retrims the coat with faux fur, giving it a trendy update.

meanings.sent1: She retrims the edges of the paper to make it neater.
meanings.sent2: He retrims the lawn to keep it looking tidy.
meanings.sent3: The chef retrims the excess fat from the meat, making it leaner.
meanings.sent4: The tailor retrims the sleeves of the shirt, ensuring a perfect fit.
meanings.sent5: The gardener retrims the bushes in intricate shapes, adding charm to the garden.
